title: How to pray at home if I missed praying with the congregation?
transcript: but the first question is if someone misses the Salah in congregation for a legitimate reason and he is about to pray home then the sequence remains he praised the Sunnah the fart then the soon afterwards and this is for Lord so he prays to then another - this is sooner before Lord for raka of the after doing a parma then to recur after the for soon this is providing that the time is open and a certain is not squeezing in so in normal cases yes this is what you should do
